body:
As you, unlike @no_chill, know, I've been here for a long time... I was here before anti-brigading measures were implemented... I saw my apolitical guilds brigaded by both far left and far right alike because of my political opinions... I eventually just gave up on apolitical content. 

Even then, ~~the nazi brigade~~ the Sturmabteilung was big, and I didn't risk standing up to the nazis... I just ignored it and moved on. 

More recently, I decided to start destroying them with facts and logic. I've been pleasantly surprised by the positive reaction when I do. It fills me with joy. This seems to have started around the time @ChocolateDonut made [the joomer](https://ruqqus.com/+smuggies/post/4zqh/shut-the-fuck-up-you-arent), so perhaps a bit of inspiration was drawn from that, perhaps it's coincidental... in either case, it brings me joy to see other people fighting the nazis like you do, comrade chairman. 

Your ~~takeover of HitlerWasRight~~ march on Berlin has made me way happier than it should have... I've been laughing on and off all this time... the rush still hasn't subsided. Keep up the good work!

![](https://i.imgur.com/cEpRrP7.jpg)

For Ruqqus, "Forever's gonna start tonight!"
body_html:
As you, unlike @no_chill, know, I've been here for a long time... I was here before anti-brigading measures were implemented... I saw my apolitical guilds brigaded by both far left and far right alike because of my political opinions... I eventually just gave up on apolitical content.

Even then, the nazi brigade the Sturmabteilung was big, and I didn't risk standing up to the nazis... I just ignored it and moved on.

More recently, I decided to start destroying them with facts and logic. I've been pleasantly surprised by the positive reaction when I do. It fills me with joy. This seems to have started around the time @ChocolateDonut made the joomer, so perhaps a bit of inspiration was drawn from that, perhaps it's coincidental... in either case, it brings me joy to see other people fighting the nazis like you do, comrade chairman.

Your takeover of HitlerWasRight march on Berlin has made me way happier than it should have... I've been laughing on and off all this time... the rush still hasn't subsided. Keep up the good work!

For Ruqqus, "Forever's gonna start tonight!"

body: @carpathianflorist I've been thinking about this for a bit... about how this takeover can be considered a good thing when by all accounts r/yiffinhell being taken over by furry retards was obviously a bad thing... I have come to a conclusion, though: the r/yiffinhell incident was carried out by administrators, shitting on the userbase. The **march on Berlin** was carried out by licit siege by a user and not the admins.
body_html: @carpathianflorist I've been thinking about this for a bit... about how this takeover can be considered a good thing when by all accounts r/yiffinhell being taken over by furry retards was obviously a bad thing... I have come to a conclusion, though: the r/yiffinhell incident was carried out by administrators, shitting on the userbase. The march on Berlin was carried out by licit siege by a user and not the admins.
